title: Daily SLO Report - Standard
description: This Workflow generates SLO reports and emails to the specified addresses.
guide:
# SLO Report
Get a list of your SLOs and sends email(s) of your choice.

# Setup
1. Change emails (`to`, `cc`, `bcc`) to be an array of strings.
2. Test with a manual Run, by click the `Run` button.
3. If everything works as expected, change the [Trigger](?trigger=) to a schedule, e.g. Weekly, Daily, etc.

# More advanced interactions
Consider using our MCP server, [local](https://github.com/dynatrace-oss/dynatrace-mcp) or [remote](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/discover-dynatrace/platform/davis-ai/dynatrace-mcp ).

slo.name: slo

input.query:
fetch spans, from: @d-1d, to: @d
| filter span.kind == "server"
| filter isNotNull(endpoint.name)
| lookup [ fetch dt.entity.service ], 
         lookupField:id, sourceField:dt.entity.service, 
         fields: {service = entity.name }
| fieldsAdd SlowRequest = if(duration >= 2s, "Slow", else:"Fast")

| summarize  {Availability = round(avg(if(request.is_failed == true, 0, else: 100)), decimals: 2),
             Performance = round(avg(if(SlowRequest == "Slow", 0, else: 100)), decimals: 2)}
             ,by:{Service = service}
| fields Service, Availability = if(Availability>=99.5, concat("✅",Availability),else:concat("❌",Availability)),Performance = if(Performance>=98, concat("✅",Performance),else:concat("❌",Performance))
